entries.s_f7ae6df2: You sure? I heard the people of this village had ways of making things go their way.
entries.s_e14b17f4: Which means it's even more important to fight. We cannot let a regime with so little regard for sapient life continue to hold the galaxy hostage. We must stop them!
entries.s_da63f16c: If you just bury your head, next time it might be your planet.
entries.s_d652c1bf: Yea, something has you spooked alright.
entries.s_d3683f06: You should always fight for what you believe in. Once you give up on that, you give up on everything.
entries.s_cf2480fb: I understand. You only want what's best for them.
entries.s_ce4f7c2b: Looking for information about the Force.
entries.s_c2be1811: Well we work the land, trade with some few freighter captains, but mostly we stay out of the way.
entries.s_bf567533: Spare me the righteous zeal. I've been there son. Lost my wife. It'll take a lot more than a pretty speech to get me to let what little family I got left to go. I think we're done here.
entries.s_a9268707: Yea, we're lucky like that. I'm sorry, but I sure don't know what your fishin for here. Maybe you should go speak to the elder.
entries.s_a6600b37: Hello. What brings you to our village?
entries.s_9cabeaee: The Force? Are you on a pilgrimage son? The only Force you'll find around here are those blasted nightsisters and they sure won't welcome any adherents.
entries.s_93ec538d: The war mostly. Most of us have lost family or friends to the war. We've resolved to not lose anyone else.
entries.s_76a2d8f9: Why don't you fight? Take a side instead of sitting out here hiding?
entries.s_69bb013d: More than you know. Look if you really want to find out the truth, why don't you go talk to the elder.
entries.s_671177b7: You're right, it might. Then what? Beg them not to fire? Jump in our squadron of X-wings? The only power we have right now is anonymity.
entries.s_60c9d96a: I only wish they could see it that way. The oldest already wants to go off and fight. I just hope it's over before he gets the chance.
entries.s_5cca5b41: Go see the village elder. He might be able to help you with whatever you're looking for. In any event, good luck.
entries.s_538ba7a9: I guess you're right. How can you fight something like that.
entries.s_4ac0f748: Would we need a reason other than the war? I mean they blew up a planet!
entries.s_42d40a3f: There's still a chance, but it's out of our hands.
entries.s_3d31f978: Most of us have. We've paid our dues in blood and pain. We're done with it. It's one thing to risk your own life in a war, but once you have children it becomes something else entirely to let them do the same.
entries.s_351f9414: What do you folks do way out here in the middle of nowhere?
entries.s_30d6ee6: Stay out of the way? Why would you want to do that?
entries.s_2b466883: Sounds like you're hiding from something more than just the war.
entries.s_29e5bb06: Nothing really. As a matter of fact I was on the way out.
entries.s_116fa06f: I'll not risk my children to this frenzy of destruction.
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (fs_village_convo3_m.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
